channel.title: Discovery Project -WIP
channel.description:
The discovery project is a Non-Profit organization in which we seek out individuals that have notable talent's but do not have the recolonization that they do not deserve, like everything in today's society, there are many people who have big talents but do not have the social presence to get noticed. What we do is help those people get noticed.
[center][b][size=24pt]What do we consider talent's:[/size][/b][/center] [center]We help a vast majority of people with so many things, and nothing is excluded. Here is just a short list:[/center]
[ul][li]Singer[/li] [li]Musician[Drummer,Guitar,dj][/li] [li]Website Hit's[/li] [li]Youtube View's[/li] [li]acting[/li] [li]academics[/li] [li]Many more![/li][/ul]
This program is currently being put together if anyone is interested in contributing just say so :) this topic will be edited in the upcoming days with fancy images along with alot more content :)

item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“JoshuaCoombs, post:9, topic:536791”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=655607.msg4388862#msg4388862 date=1386720918]
I can fit 72 grapes in my mouth (kinky)

does this count?
[/quote]

Call me JK but sorry it don’t count ! Now put a watermelon in that puppy and we shall see LOL[/quote]Actually if you fit a whole watermelon into a puppy, it would most likely die.

Read full topic

item.title: Discovery Project -WIP
item.dc:creator: @JoshuaCoombs JoshuaCoombs
item.description:
@JoshuaCoombs wrote:

TabbyKiller:

I’m wondering how you’re going about to get these undiscovered individuals out there? The only way I can think of is YouTube, its simple, popular, easy to setup, and it will help build a small organization. While reading your topic I got the impression that you’re going to somewhat make a show of some sort, hosting it with commentary showing that weeks talent or something. I’m curious on how you’re going to get the point across.

You are right about youtube, my basic plan is to seek individuals who have talents for example, i see someone who can sing amazing and only got 800 youtube views, i contact this person tell them about the program, and through connections through social media, and other place’s i will release there video on our Discovery Channel and showcase it, along with having a review section, how will i get traffic to the video’s well my good friend i went to school with Ryan Moriarty is the owner of LOLSpots and he will be helping along with my 4 facebook accounts with over 8,000 followers each. this is just in the planing stages ill have more information soon

Read full topic

item.title: Discovery Project -WIP
item.dc:creator: @JoshuaCoombs JoshuaCoombs
item.description:
@JoshuaCoombs wrote:

TabbyKiller:

Sounds like a TV show, or something from modern MTV. It’s a good idea but you’re going to have to put in a little bit of elbow grease yourself rather than just scrounging your fame off others.

Im prepared to go through hard work.

Read full topic
